awakening.title: Awakening
awakening.definition: The process of remembering our true nature as beings of love and light, recognizing our connection with the Divine Source and all of creation.

healing.title: Healing
healing.definition: The restoration of wholeness and balance in body, mind, and spirit. True healing is not merely the absence of symptoms, but the alignment with one's divine nature and purpose.

forgiveness.title: Forgiveness
forgiveness.definition: The release of resentment, judgment, and grievances. A sacred act that frees both the forgiver and the forgiven, allowing divine love to flow unobstructed.

channel.title: Channel
channel.definition: A person who allows divine energy, wisdom, or healing power to flow through them without obstruction. One who serves as a conduit for spiritual forces.

Christ-consciousness.title: Christ Consciousness
Christ-consciousness.definition: A state of awareness characterized by unconditional love, unity with all beings, and recognition of the divine presence in all things. The consciousness Jesus embodied and taught.

catalyst.title: Catalyst
catalyst.definition: Experiences, challenges, or events that stimulate spiritual growth and learning. Opportunities for transformation disguised as difficulties.

crystallization.title: Crystallization
crystallization.definition: The process of clarifying and strengthening one's spiritual essence through practice, choice, and dedication. The refinement of the soul through intentional living.

desire.title: Desire
desire.definition: The yearning of the soul toward growth, love, and reunion with the Divine. Sacred longing that propels spiritual evolution.

energy-body.title: Energy Body
energy-body.definition: The subtle, non-physical aspect of a being composed of vital life force. This includes the aura, chakras, and meridian systems through which healing energy flows.

energy-centers.title: Energy Centers
energy-centers.definition: Points in the energy body (chakras) where spiritual, emotional, and physical energies converge. These centers process and distribute life force throughout the being.

faith.title: Faith
faith.definition: Trust in divine love and wisdom beyond what the physical senses can perceive. The willingness to remain open to spiritual truth and guidance.

free-will.title: Free Will
free-will.definition: The sacred gift of choice given to all beings. The ability to choose love or fear, service or separation, in each moment.

inner-planes.title: Inner Planes
inner-planes.definition: Non-physical dimensions of existence where consciousness operates beyond the physical body. Realms of spirit, thought, and energy accessible through meditation and spiritual practice.

karma.title: Karma
karma.definition: The spiritual law of cause and effect. Not punishment, but the natural balancing of energies and opportunities for learning from our choices.

light-touch.title: Light Touch
light-touch.definition: A gentle, respectful approach to healing that honors the free will and sovereignty of the one receiving healing. Working with subtle energies rather than force.

meditation.title: Meditation
meditation.definition: The practice of quieting the mind and opening the heart to receive divine guidance and healing. A sacred space of communion with the Source.

polarity.title: Polarity
polarity.definition: The existence of apparent opposites (light/dark, positive/negative, service to others/service to self) that create the dynamic tension necessary for growth and choice.

prana.title: Prana
prana.definition: The universal life force energy that sustains all living beings. Also known as chi, ki, or vital energy. The breath of the Divine that animates creation.

service.title: Service
service.definition: The offering of one's gifts, energy, and presence for the benefit of others and the greater good. Love made visible through action.

will.title: Will
will.definition: The faculty of conscious choice and directed intention. When aligned with divine will, it becomes a powerful force for healing and transformation.
